title: Warm Nap Weather
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>In spring one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn, right~. So warm~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Kanata-san, do you plan to sleep while hugging me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeh, it feels nice though. Honoka-chan, doesn’t this nice weather make you sleepy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, now that you say it…. This morning Yukiho forced me out of bed so I didn’t get enough sleep~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, let’s take a li~ttle bit of a nap<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I want to take a nap! But, this nice weather also makes me want to move around in practice<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I see, that’s reasonable…. But Kanata-chan can’t resist this weather after all~. Is 5 minutes fine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm~, I guess it’s fine if it’s just 5 minutes! Good night~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Fwah….? Nggh~ I slept well…. Slept!? I fell asleep!? Eh, what time is it….? Uwaa~~! Kanata-chan, wake up-! We’ve slept for 2 hours-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Nnh~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
